# Project Instructions

This project demonstrates GitHub Copilot custom instructions and Anthropic skills integration.

## Code Style
- Write clean, readable code with meaningful names
- Follow language-specific style guides
- Keep functions focused and small
- Add comments for complex logic only

## Documentation
- Document public APIs and exported functions
- Include examples in documentation
- Keep README files up to date
- Use clear commit messages

## Testing
- Write tests for new features
- Maintain existing test coverage
- Use descriptive test names
- Mock external dependencies

## Security
- Never commit secrets or credentials
- Validate all user inputs
- Use environment variables for configuration
- Follow security best practices for the language

## Project Context
This repository provides examples and guidance for:
1. GitHub Copilot custom instructions
2. Language-specific development patterns
3. Anthropic skills integration
4. Migration strategies between approaches
